decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to utilize the combo potential of Nadu, Winged Wisdom in conjunction with Nomads en-Kor to draw through the deck quickly and find the necessary pieces to win the game. The deck also includes various control elements such as Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to protect the combo pieces and disrupt opponent's strategies. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Endurance and Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional utility and protection. The deck aims to efficiently set up the combo and win the game before the opponent can react.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Combo - Reanimator strategy by quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Animate Dead and Reanimate. By combining powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats before they can effectively respond, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while efficiently controlling the board through a combination of removal spells, counter magic, and card draw. The goal is to outvalue the opponent by using powerful card advantage engines like Baleful Strix and Snapcaster Mage, while also utilizing disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Kolaghan's Command to disrupt their game plan. The deck also includes some finishers like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Hidetsugu Consumes All to close out the game once the opponent has been sufficiently neutralized.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Faithless Looting, and then bringing them back onto the battlefield using reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck aims to cheat out high-cost creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty for a quick and powerful win. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Unmask and Thoughtseize to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It relies on fast mana acceleration with Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual to quickly execute its game plan.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards like Urza's Saga, Dauthi Voidwalker, and Leyline of the Void to disrupt the opponent's strategy and generate strong effects. By using cards like Dark Ritual and Mox Diamond for fast mana, the deck aims to quickly establish a dominant board presence and control the game. The inclusion of Karn, the Great Creator allows for additional disruption and the ability to tutor for key artifacts like Helm of Obedience. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful and synergistic combo strategy.

The main concept of this Legacy deck is to utilize the combo between Mystic Forge and Manifold Key to generate value and card advantage, while also ramping up mana with cards like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal. Karn, the Great Creator provides additional utility and disruption, while cards like Voltaic Key and Talon Gates of Madara help manipulate artifacts and accelerate the combo. The deck aims to assemble the necessary pieces quickly to overwhelm opponents with powerful interactions and threats.

The main concept of this Legacy combo deck is to use cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Echo of Eons to generate mana and draw cards quickly, while utilizing artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Bauble to trigger Riddlesmith's ability to draw more cards. The deck aims to assemble a combo win condition involving Grapeshot and other spells to deal lethal damage to the opponent in a single turn. Defense Grid and other protection spells help to prevent disruption from the opponent, allowing the deck to execute its game plan without interference.

This UWx Control deck focuses on removal, counterspells, and card advantage to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It utilizes a mix of creature removal spells, cantrips, and powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo, Narset, and Teferi to disrupt the opponent's game plan and generate advantage. The deck also includes a small creature package to apply pressure and close out the game when the opportunity arises. With a strong mana base and a versatile suite of spells, this deck aims to control the game and dictate the pace of play until it can secure a victory.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a strong offensive strategy. It uses cards like Reanimate and Entomb to efficiently put creatures into the graveyard, while also utilizing control elements like Brainstorm and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck includes versatile creatures like Troll of Khazad-dûm and Archon of Cruelty to provide different threat options. The key strategy is to combine speed and disruption to overwhelm the opponent with powerful reanimated creatures.
